Title: Gem Hunt
Writer: Jeff Liu, Colin Howard, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story), Matt Burnett (story editor), Ben Levin (story editor)
Actors: Kimberly Brooks, Zach Callison, Deedee Magno, Grace Rolek
Plot: Steven, Pearl and Connie go to the Great North to hunt down a corrupted gem.
